description: Documentation for 9.7.16.2. Matrix and Data Movement Shape

directories.name: 971621_matrix_shape
directories.description: The matrix multiply and accumulate operations support a limited set of shapes for the operand matrices `A`, `B` and `D`. The shapes of all three matrix operands are collectively described by the tuple *MxNxK* where `A` is *MxK* matrix, `B` is a *KxN* matrix, and `D` is a *MxN* matrix.

directories.name: 971623_data_movement_shape

files.title: Overview
files.summary: There are two kinds of shapes involved.

files.title: 9.7.16.2.2. Specifying Matrix Shape
files.summary: *M* and *N* can be specified in the [Instruction descriptor](https://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/parallel-thread-execution/#tcgen05-instruction-descriptor).
